There are five national parks in Alajuela, a wildlife national reserve, five protective areas and several forest reserves.  Also in the province is the Juan Santamaría Museum which exhibits locally produced crafts.  This area ranks first in national coffee and cane sugar production.

For several years Maria has been involved in agriculture.  She now has her own land, approximately 3/4 of a hectare, which she inherited from her parents. But she is lacking what she needs most for the business to take off and benefit the local community.  She claims her project is very interesting.

She is requesting a micro-loan of 400,000 CRC to buy passion fruit seeds.  This will help grow her business and increase her family's quality of life.

Maria is a member of the communal bank Delirio which is one of the 110 member organizations of EDESA in Costa Rica.  This is her first loan and with it she hopes to continue growing both personally and economically.  She wants to participate actively in her community's loan organization.

loans.use: To plant passion fruit.

loans.name: Twitezimbere /cyrkr Group

texts.fr:
Domitien  fait partie du groupe Twitezimbere. Le nom du groupe signifie « développement des membres». Il a 32 ans et il est marié avec 6 enfants de 1 à 12 ans, dont 3 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est  4 ans de primaire.

Domitien est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des semences sélectionnées. Dans les prochaines années, Domitien voudrait d’acheter d’autres champs de culture du riz. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Domitien belongs to the Twitezimbere group. The name of this group means " development of the members". He is 32 years old and married with six children, whose ages range from one to 12 years old; three of them are at school. He himself has four years of primary education.

Domitien is a rice farmer. This is his first loan from ACB and he is going to use it to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice farming activity.

He plans to grow his business by using selected seeds. In the next few years, Domitien would like to buy other rice-growing fields. With the profits he makes he is planning to educate and look after his children.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice farming activity

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en: Avelina is 62 years old and lives in Sapang Ama. She is married and has seven children. Avelina is engaged in a nipa-palm-weaving business. She earns approximately 3500 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,999 PHP to purchase nipa palm and rattan for her weaving business. Avelina has been a member of PMPC for 20 years.

loans.use: to purchase nipa palm and rattan for her weaving business.

location.town: Calamba-Sapang Ama Sapang Dalaga Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a married man with two children who have completed high school. His wife is a businesswoman who contributes to the provision of their family's basic needs. He owns a house with neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for his family.

Samuel has operated a poultry business for the past four years; he sells his livestock at the market, and his potential clients are the local area residents. He faces the major challenge fluctuating commodity prices in the market. He dreams of expanding his business.

With his KES 30,000 loan, he wants to purchase chicks and chicken feed. He decided to join Yehu Microfinance because of its short loan processing time.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Manuel tiene 54 años y  y vive en la aldea de Luis Vasquez en el municipio de San Pedro Sula.  Lleva 30 años de casado con su esposa Zulema, la cual es modista. La pareja tiene un hijo de 20 años y una hija de 28 años. La pareja y el hijo aportan a los gastos familiares. 

Don Manuel empezó como un ayudante asalariado en madera. Cuando ya tenía el conocimiento de como manejar la madera, se decidió independizarse para tener mejores ingresos para su familia. Su familia le motivó a realizarse como contratista y así, con muchos esfuerzos, logró tener su propia casa. 

De su casa, don Manuel realiza tallados de todo tipo de madera para hacer puertas, closets, mesas y escritorios. También él construye muebles para la cocina y el dormitorio y hace cortes de moldes para ventanas y puertas. Es un experto en su trabajo ya que tiene casi 35 años de experiencia. Trabaja 10 horas al día laborando su producto y comenta que cuando hay apagones, no puede trabajar. 

El señor Manuel ha solicitado dos ciclos crediticios anteriores y él se notó mejoras en el negocio y un crecimiento de estabilidad y orgullo en su familia. Manuel ha podido ofrecer mejores productos y construirlos más rápido para su clientela. Con este crédito de  L20,000, don Manuel comprará materia prima para seguir elaborando su trabajo en madera. En el futuro tiene previsto alquilar un local en donde poner el negocio para captar más contractos y así, continuar logrando mejoras en su familia.
texts.en:
Manuel, age 54, lives in the village of Luis Vasquez in the San Pedro Sula municipality.  He has been married to his wife, Zulema, for 30 years.  She is a seamstress.  The couple has a 20 year old son and a 28 year old daughter.  The couple and their son contribute to the family expenses.

Manuel started as a paid helper in woodwork.  When he had the knowledge of how to work with the wood he decided to become independent in order to have better income for the family.  His family motivated him to become a contractor.  That way, with a lot of effort, he managed to have his own house.

From his house Manuel makes carvings from all types of wood in order to make doors, closets, tables, and desks.  He also builds kitchen and bedroom furniture.  He also cuts molds for windows and doors.  He is an expert at his work because he has almost 35 years of experience.  He works ten hours a day laboring over his product.  He says that when there are blackouts he is not able to work.

Manuel has requested two loans from two previous cycles.  He has noted the improvements in the business, the increased stability, and the pride in his family.  Manuel has been able to offer better products and to build them more rapidly for his clientele.

With this loan for 20,000 lempiras Manuel will buy raw material to continue his work making wood products.

In the future he foresees renting a place to put his business in order to get more contracts.  That way he will continue to manage improvements for his family.

loans.use: to buy raw material to build furniture.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 35-year-old, hardworking businessman. He is married and blessed with two children, one of whom is in school. He has been selling sand for the last four years to support his family. Moses has been able to retain his business because of his good reputation with his customers. 

Moses is requesting a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings to buy sand for resale. In the next 5 years, he plans to open another business outlet.

loans.use: to buy sand.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is 36 years old and married with four children, two of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For the past seven years, she has operated a fishing business in the Philippines. 

Rosalie is requesting an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and equipment

loans.name: Sabina

texts.en:
Sabina is a 25-year-old married woman with four children, all of whom are in school. She has a business selling clothes in Kator in South Sudan. She has been in this business for four years.

Sabina is requesting a loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase clothes. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell.

loans.name: Athiong

texts.en:
Athiong is a 39-year-old married woman with five children, three of whom are in school. She has run a charcoal selling business in Bor South Sudan for two years.
Athiong is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use the extra income to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Noudéhouénou Françoise

texts.fr: Noudéhouénou Françoise âgée de 46 ans, n’a pas fréquentée l’école. Noudéhouénou Françoise est mariée à un certain Edmond. Le couple a cinq enfants, certains scolarisés et à leur charge. Noudéhouénou Françoise vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Les diverses charges de la maison sont supportées par le couple. Pour cette raison, Noudéhouénou Françoise vend depuis quinze ans à son domicile des condiments et de l’igname. Cette activité lui génère des revenus l'aidant à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille. Noudéhouénou Françoise achète ses produits dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle, Noudéhouénou Françoise sollicite pour une deuxième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le prêt antérieur a été bien remboursé.

loans.use: Acheter des condiments et de l'igname.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.en:
My name is Rafael E. and I sell products for men and women, such as creams, shampoo, conditioner, shoes, lotions, perfumes, shirts. I\'ve had my business for 3 years. My clientele is excellent because I sent good quality products at an accessible price to the community. My business generates good income for me to support my family. My goal is to increase my inventory to have a wider variety of products, and with the earnings that I obtain, to buy a window to show my product, remodel my business and support my family.

This is a translation of the original business description in Spanish:

Mi nombre es Rafael E. me dedico a la venta de productos para dama y caballero como ser cremas, shampoo, acondicionador, zapatos, lociones, perfumes, camisas, tengo mi negocio hace unos 3 años, mi clientela es excelente porque vendo producto de buena calidad a un precio accesible a la comunidad, mi negocio me genera ingresos para sustentar mi familia, mi meta es incrementar mi inventario para tener una mayor variedad de producto y con las ganancias que obtenga comprar una vitrina para exponer mi producto, remodelar mi negocio (casa de habitacion) y mantener mi familia.

loans.use: Purchasing shoes, perfumes, lotions, shampoo, creams, deodorants, and men\\\'s shirts

loans.name: María De La Luz

texts.en:
María de la Luz is married and has been making and selling decorative handicrafts for the past 15 years. This occupation has helped her provide for and educate her eight children. Her children are now grown and she lives alone with her husband, who is sick and cannot work. The income that Doña María receives from her work is the only income for this household. One of her daughters helps her make her products. María is asking for a loan of $375, which she will use to buy the materials she needs to continue her work.

You can help this family. Doña María is very willing to work, but she needs your collaboration. This is your opportunity to help to someone in need, have no doubts, her future is in your hands.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora María de la Luz es casada, desde hace 15 años hace y vende manualidades, este oficio le ha ayudado a darles sustento y educación a sus ocho hijos. Sus hijos ya están grandes y vive sola con su esposo que está enfermo y no puede trabajar, por lo que el ingreso que recibe Doña María por su trabajo es el único para este hogar, una de sus hijas le ayuda en la elaboración de sus productos. La señora María solicita un préstamo de $ 375 dólares que utilizará en la compra de los materiales que necesita para continuar con su labor.

Tú puedes ayudar a esta familia, Doña María está muy dispuesta a trabajar pero necesita de tu colaboración, es tu oportunidad de ayudar a quien más lo necesita, no lo dudes más, su futuro está en tus manos.

loans.use: To buy materials

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
My name is Mercedes and I have run a clothing store downtown for several years. The store provides for my family. Currently my husband is without a job and the store is what gives us income. I need to purchase more products to increase the variety of the clothes I have on offer.

Hola Mi nombre es Mercedes, soy comerciante, tengo varios años de dedicarme a este tipo de actividad, cuento con un negocio de venta de ropa nueva ubicado en la plaza de mi ciudad, el que me genera ingreso para contribuir con los gastos de mi familia, actualmente mi esposo no tiene empleo y este negocio es el que no esta generando ingreso para subsistir, actualmente necesito surtir mas mi negocio para poder ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a los clientes.

loans.use: Purchase women's and girls' dresses, blouses, underwear, pants, men's dress shirts, and boys' shirts.
